items.summary: Create a new dedicated `/receive` route (page) in the router that renders a full-screen QR scanner experience. This page should display the camera viewfinder, scan a QR code, fetch the associated transfer record, and show the file receive/download UI â€” all without overlaying a modal on top of the existing dashboard. The page should include a back/close button that navigates the user back to the previous screen.

Update the QR scanner trigger in TransferHistory (and any other location that opens the QR scanner modal) so that tapping the scan button navigates to the new `/receive` route instead of opening QRScannerModal as a modal dialog.
